code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ViewAssignments=()=>{const assignments=[{id:1,title:'Math Homework',description:'Solve problems 1-10',deadline:'2023-10-15',status:'Pending'},{id:2,title:'Science Project',description:'Build a model',deadline:'2023-10-20',status:'Submitted'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"View Assignments"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:assignments.map(assignment=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:assignment.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:assignment.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Deadline: ",assignment.deadline]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Status: ",assignment.status]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",children:"Download"})]},assignment.id))})]});};export default ViewAssignments;
